item.title: Help Me Choose a Package Name
item.description: What’s in a name? That which we call a rose By any other word would smell as sweet â€” William Shakespeare, Romeo and Juliet I have plans for re-implementing several of the data structures I wrote about in Functional Data Structures in R.

item.title: Variable bindings with pattern matching
item.description: I just added a new feature to my pmatch package. You will need the development version to get it, until I make a new release, and I have a few more features planned before that.
